text: Whether Meghan Markle ’ s father shows at St. George ’ s Chapel at Windsor Castle on Saturday was the subject of fevered speculation among royal obsessives on Tuesday. Thomas Markle told the celebrity news site TMZ on Tuesday that he wanted to walk his daughter down the aisle, but was not sure if he could. “ Of course I ’ d walk her down the aisle. This is a historic moment. I ’ d like to be a part of history, ” he told the website. But he wasn ’ t sure if he would be able to travel to Britain. He said he was back in the hospital after suffering chest pains and wasn ’ t sure if the doctors would release him in time. He also told TMZ website that Meghan tried calling him on Monday, but he missed the call.
